channel.title: SoulScape!
channel.description:
My Server is finally hosted and Is ready for players.
Admins: Kilk Dharocks Java
Mods: Taco DivineKnight Simontuong
Hoster: Java
Status: Online (should be online 24/7)
Features: Food works We have shops that work great Quite a few npcs No Spawning Are Smoke Dungeon has deadly red spiders, a kbd, blue dragons, baby blue dragons ::kbd to go to the cow place in lumby to find it filled with kbds You do loose what was in ur inventory though. We have 3 unique shops, 1 a dragon store which also has a glory ammy, 2 a food store which goes up to sharks, 3 a rare shop which has every rare but they cost alot. Our npcs drop money and some of the higher lvl npcs drop really good stuff. The ::bank command works for everyone Easy Combat Lvling
Server Ip: soulscape.no-ip.biz OR Download Client on the forums
Forums: [url=http://soulscape.iforumer.com/index.php]http://soulscape.iforumer.com/index.php[/url]
Credits: Kilk, Pljay03, Diablo1123, Java for hosting
Commands: ::help ::smoke ::kbd ::save ::cows ::chickens ::party ::players ::empty ::yell
One of best servers out!!!!!!!Everyone who has played loves it!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
